Sentencas: This paper performs an exergy analysis of a gasification combined cycle to improve its performance and power output.
Titulo: EXERGY ANALYSIS OF A GASIFICATION-BASED COMBINED CYCLE WITH SOLID OXIDE FUEL CELLS FOR COGENERATION

Sentencas: Coal gasification and combined cycle power generation are efficient ways in which coal can be used for power generation.
Titulo: EXERGY ANALYSIS OF A GASIFICATION-BASED COMBINED CYCLE WITH SOLID OXIDE FUEL CELLS FOR COGENERATION

Sentencas: The paper investigates the exergetic performance of the system to estimate the optimal operating conditions of a co-fired (coal and natural gas) combined cycle cogeneration power plant with a solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: EXERGY ANALYSIS OF A GASIFICATION-BASED COMBINED CYCLE WITH SOLID OXIDE FUEL CELLS FOR COGENERATION

Sentencas: The maximum fuel cell power output, combined cycle net work output, combined cycle exergetic efficiency, fuel utilization exergetic efficiency, sustainability index, CO2 emissions, and exergy destruction are determined for the plant.
Titulo: EXERGY ANALYSIS OF A GASIFICATION-BASED COMBINED CYCLE WITH SOLID OXIDE FUEL CELLS FOR COGENERATION

Sentencas: The results provide useful new data to improve the efficiency of gasification combined cycle cogeneration.
Titulo: EXERGY ANALYSIS OF A GASIFICATION-BASED COMBINED CYCLE WITH SOLID OXIDE FUEL CELLS FOR COGENERATION
